short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Never forget to record your Google Meet video conferences again and find them in the Leexi app in one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically record and summarize all your meetings on Google Meet with this extension.

Also available for Microsoft Teams and Zoom, you can capture the informations you need and enhance your productivity.

- Contextualized summary
- Follow-up emails
- AI note-taking
- Complete transcription with 10+ speakers identification
- Transcribe all the transcription in 100+ languages
- Time-stamped notes during calls
- Automatically load your CRM (Salesforce, Hubspot, Pipedrive,...) with call information
- Share call shorts
- Upload video and audio files
- Dictaphone for physical meetings
- And much more...

Leexi allows you to effortlessly transcribe, analyze, and summarize calls and video conferences.

Start now and enjoy the summary of your next meetings !

https://www.leexi.ai/en/pricing/
